/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A white car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds dotting the horizon. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the scene.
